physical_appearance:This clipping is a page from the periodical \u0027The Orient Illustrated Weekly\u0027
 titled \u0027Jawaharlal in Ipoh\u0027. The title is printed at the top of the page. The clipping includes six black-and-white photographs
 taken in the town of Ipoh Malaya
 during Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru\u0027s visit in March 1946. The edges of the page are slightly torn
 especially on the right.

metadata.title_text: The Orient Weekly Jawaharlal in Ipoh
metadata.physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly', titled 'Jawaharlal in Ipoh'. The title is printed at the top of the page. The clipping includes six black-and-white photographs, taken in the town of Ipoh Malaya, during Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru's visit in March 1946. The edges of the page are slightly torn, especially on the right.
